topic.title: Badges
topic.abstract: Documentation and examples for badges, Bootstrap's small count and labeling component.

section.title: Example
section.p: Badges scale to match the size of the immediate parent element by using relative font sizing and em units. As of v5, badges no longer have focus or hover styles for links.

section.title: Background colors
section.p: Use Bootstrap's background utility classes to quickly change the appearance of a badge. Please note that when using Bootstrap's default CSS classes using DITA's outputclass with the value bg-light, youâ€™ll likely need a text color utility attribute on outputclass like text-dark as well for proper styling. This is because background utilities do not set anything but background-color.
